text: Todi ye khto kazhe do yoho batʹkiv, "Prykroshchiv do vas; vy kazhete meni shcho (pislya smerti) ya povernusya do zhyttya? Yak prybuvaty tsey khto vmerly pered tym, yak ny nikoly ne povertayutʹsya?" Batʹky by krychaly dlya BOZHOYI dopomohy ta kazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do vas; budʹ laska povirte! BOZHA obitsyanka yavlyaye soboyu pravdu."Vin by skazav, "Povisti z mynuli
